name: electron-screenshot-hotkey
description: Electron + React + TS + Tailwind app that captures a screenshot on Cmd/Ctrl+4 and displays it.

scripts.start:electron: wait-on tcp:5173 file:dist-electron/main.js file:dist-electron/preload.js && nodemon --watch dist-electron --ext js --signal SIGTERM --exec "VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron ."
scripts.build: npm run build:renderer && npm run build:electron
